description: Recursion counts for summation table A003056 with formula a(0,x) = x, a(y,0) = y, a(y,x) = a((y XOR x),2*(y AND x))
maple: add2c := proc(a,b) option remember; if((0 = a) or (0 = b)) then RETURN(0); else RETURN(1+add_c(XORnos(a,b),2*ANDnos(a,b))); fi; end;
mathematica: trinv[n_] := Floor[(1/2)*(Sqrt[8*n + 1] + 1)];Sum2c[a_, b_] := Sum2c[a, b] = If[0 == a || 0 == b, Return[0], Return[ Sum2c[BitXor[a, b], 2*BitAnd[a, b]] + 1]];a[n_] := Sum2c[n - (1/2)*trinv[n]*(trinv[n] - 1), (trinv[n] - 1)*(trinv[ n]/2 + 1) - n];Table[a[n], {n, 0, 120}](* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Mar 07 2016, adapted from Maple *)
